content:
Any Backdrop contributors want to participate in this survey? https://www.linuxfoundation.org/blog/2020/06/linux-foundation-harvard-announce-free-libre-and-open-source-software-foss-contributor-survey/

Linux Foundation & Harvard Announce Free/Libre and Open Source Software (FOSS) Contributor Survey
In 2020, we want to identify how to improve security, including the sustainability of Free/Libre and Open Source Software (FOSS), especially the FOSS systems heavily relied upon by organizations worldwide.
I took the survey, but it took more than 15 minutes :)
